Summary: Red orange fireball 45degrees vert from sea level. Looked implode or get smaller then vanish without moving in the sky. Lasted 3 mins
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Discovery Bay
There were no other sightings in Discovery Bay on or around December 31st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on my back deck I looked up thinking a plane was flying by. The color was wrong, a red orange fireball. I called for my girlfriend to come look. She came out and her jaw dropped. It wasn't moving. But pulsating getting smaller. Then it was gone. No trail. No flash zipping across the sky. Just gone.
